line.name: ACE
line.text:
Planned Work
[A] Manhattan-bound trains skip Shepherd Av, Van Siclen Av and Liberty Av

Late Nights, 11:15 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, until May 17

For service to these stations, take the [A] to Broadway Junction and transfer to an
Ozone Park/Howard Beach-bound [A].

For service from these stations, take the [A] to Euclid Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [A].




Sandy Reroute  Posted: 04/17/2013 10:09AM

Until further notice:

[A] No trains between Howard Beach-JFK/Broad Channel and the Rockaways due to damage sustained during hurricane Sandy.

Free shuttle buses operate nonstop between Howard Beach [A] and Mott Av [H] Stations.

[H] Free shuttle trains operate between Mott Av and Beach 90 St, days and evenings.

Q22  buses provide local service in the Rockaways.

Find out more at:  http://www.mta.info/nyct/service/RebuildingRockawaysAfterHurricanSandy.htm

line.name: NQR
line.text:
Planned Work
[R] Service ends early between 36 St, Brooklyn and 71 Av, Queens[FT]


Late Evenings, Mon to Thu, Apr 15 - 18

Service operates between 95 St and 36 St in Brooklyn.

Travel Alternatives:
[N] trains make all stops between 36 St and Jay St-MetroTech.
[M] trains make all stops between Queens Plaza and 71 Av.
[D] trains provide alternate service between Brooklyn and Manhattan.

• Transfer between [R] and [D] [N] trains at 36 St.
• Transfer between [D] and [M] trains at B'way-Lafayette St.

Last Forest Hills-bound train:  Last Bay Ridge-bound train:
95 St9:28 PM  71 Av9:25 PM
DeKalb Av9:52 PMLexington Av/59 St9:50 PM
Canal St10:06 PMCanal St10:07 PM
Times Sq-42 St10:16 PMWhitehall St10:15 PM

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[N] No trains between Jay St-MetroTech and Queensboro Plaza[FT]
[Q] Trains are rerouted in Manhattan
[R] Service ends early in Manhattan and Queens


Late Nights, 10 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 15 - 19

[N] Service operates in two sections:
1. Between Stillwell Av and Jay St-MetroTech, making local stops
2. Between Queensboro Plaza and Ditmars Blvd

[Q] Service operates between Stillwell Av and DeKalb Av, and is rerouted as follows:
1. Via the [D] between DeKalb Av and 47-50 Sts
2. Via the [F] to/from 57 St

[R] Service operates in Brooklyn between 95 St and 36 St.
• Please see separate advisory for travel information.

Travel AlternativesFASTRACK map | pdf

• Take the [7] for service between Queens and Manhattan.
• Take the [2] [4] [D] [Q] for service between Brooklyn and Manhattan.

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/17/2013  8:32PM

Due to paving at Adam Clayton Powell Blvd and 128 St, M2, M100, M101, M60 and Bx15 buses are detoured as follows:

Eastbound: Via 125 St, left on Frederick Douglas Blvd, right on 135 St, right on Lenox Av, left on 125 St, then regular route.

Westbound: Via 125 St, right on Lenox Av, left on 135 St, left on Frederick Douglas Blvd, right on 125 St, then regular route.



Service Change  Posted: 04/17/2013  7:56PM

Due to paving on Webster Av and E Tremont Av, Bx41 buses are detoured as follows:

Northbound: Via Webster Av, right on Claremont Pkwy, left on 3 Av, left on E Tremont Av, right on Webster Av, then regular route.

Southbound: Via Webster Av, Left on E Tremont Av, right on 3 Av, right on Claremont Av, left on webster Av, then regular route.



Planned Detour
Bx41 buses running with delays due to paving

Weeknights, 7 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 8 - May 3

Northbound/Southbound: Buses will run with delays due
to paving from Webster Av between E 203 St to E 165 St.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx28 and Bx30 buses bypassing stop due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are bypassing the Gun Hill Rd at Bronxwood Av bus stop.

Eastbound/Westbound: Customers are advised to use the
temporary bus stop on Gun Hill Rd at Colden Av.




Planned Detour
Bx9, Bx12/Bx12SBS, Bx17 and Bx22 buses running with delays due to paving

Weeknights, 7 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 8 - May 3

Northbound/Southbound Bx9, Bx17 and Bx22: Buses
will run will delays from E Fordham Rd between Southern
Blvd and 3 Av.

Eastbound/Westbound: Buses will run will delays from
E Fordham Rd between Southern Blvd and 3 Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx12/Bx12SBS buses running with delays due to paving

Weeknights, 7 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 8 - May 3

Eastbound/Westbound: Buses will run with delays
from E Fordham Rd between the Grand Concourse
and University Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx12, Bx12 SBS and Bx22 bus stops are temporarily discontinued due to road construction

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Fordham Rd between Bronx
River Pkwy and Southern Blvd.

The Bx12 and Bx22 bus stop at Southern Blvd is temporarily
discontinued. Buses will stop at Belmont Av in both directions.

The Bx12 SBS bus stop at Southern Blvd is temporarily
discontinued. Buses will stop at Crotona Av in both directions.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx12 and Bx12SBS route changes due to construction

All times

Due to long term construction, bus stops and terminals
have been relocated at Bay Plaza. Buses will operate
as follows:

New Bus Stops
Bx12/SBS Eastbound: On Bay Plz Blvd, far side, Co-op
City Blvd (across from Pier 1/Daffy's).
On Bay Plz Blvd, far side, Co-op City Blvd (across from
Applebee's/Raymour & Flanigan).

Bx12/SBS Westbound:
On Bay Plz Blvd, at Applebee's (First stop).

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx3, Bx11, Bx13, Bx35 and Bx36 bus stop change due to construction

Until further notice

Buses will not make the W 181 St at Amsterdam Av stop.

Westbound: Customers are advised to use W 181 St
at Audubon Av for bus service.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/17/2013  8:32PM

Due to paving at Adam Clayton Powell Blvd and 128 St, M2, M100, M101, M60 and Bx15 buses are detoured as follows:

Eastbound: Via 125 St, left on Frederick Douglas Blvd, right on 135 St, right on Lenox Av, left on 125 St, then regular route.

Westbound: Via 125 St, right on Lenox Av, left on 135 St, left on Frederick Douglas Blvd, right on 125 St, then regular route.



Planned Detour
M31 bus stop change

Until further notice

Buses are bypassing the York Av at 61 St stop.

Westbound: Customers are advised to board
on 62 St at York Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M22 bus stop change due to construction

Until further notice

Temporary bus stop change due to construction.

M22 Westbound: Buses will bypass stops on
Chambers St at Church St and West Broadway.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M22 buses detoured due to the Chambers Street Reconstruction Project Phase II

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Chambers St between
North End Av and Broadway.

Eastbound: Buses will make stops along Warren St
between North End Av and West St.

On Warren St between Broadway and Church St at
corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 bus bypassing stop due to the Tribeca Film Festival

Beginning, 12 AM Mon, Apr 15 to 11:59 PM Mon, Apr 29

Buses will not make the Harrison St at West St stop.

Northbound: Customers are advised to use the
Harrison St at Hudson St stop.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 buses detoured due to a bus stop closure

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from 7 Av South at West
10 St (Christopher St).

Southbound: Buses will make stops on 7 Av South
at Waverly Pl or Barrow St.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M5 and M20 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Bus stops on State St on the far side of Whitehall and Water Sts
and on the near side of Broad St are temporarily closed.

Northbound: For the State St at Whitehall St bus stop, customers
are advised to board southbound on State St near the South Ferry
Terminal entrance.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 buses detoured due to the Chambers Street Reconstruction Project

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from West Broadway at Chambers St.

Southbound: Buses will make stops along West Broadway
between Reade and Duane Sts at corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M15 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Bus stops along South St at Broad and Whitehall Sts are
temporarily closed.

Northbound: For the Broad St and Whitehall St stops,
customers are advised to board at the South Ferry Terminal.

For the Water St at Broad St bus stop, customers are advised
to board at Old Slip.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M11 buses are running with delays due to construction

All times

Southbound: Buses are running with delays due to construction
on Columbus Av between W 64 and W 63 Sts.

Note: Buses do not operate late nights.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M5, M7 and M104 bus stop temporarily relocated

Until further notice

Due to construction, the bus stop on Broadway between
64 St and 63 St has been temporarily relocated.

Southbound: Customers are advised to board on
Broadway between 63 and 62 Sts.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/17/2013  4:06PM

Q38 bus detoured due to road work on 80 St and Furmanville.

Detour is as follows:

Northbound: Via Penelope Av, left on 80 St, right on Furmanville Av and regular route. 

Corresponding stops will be made on 80 St.

Allow additional travel time. 



Planned Detour
Q25, Q25Ltd, Q34, Q65 and Q65Ltd bus stop change

All times

Bus stop change implemented to help alleviate traffic
congestion on the southbound side of Sutphin Blvd as
well as the intersection of Sutphin Blvd at Archer Av.

Southbound: Buses will use the Sutphin Blvd between
Archer Av and 94 St location as a drop-off only bus stop.

line.name: S40 - S98
line.text:
Planned Detour
S74 buses running with delays due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are running with delays due to construction on
Van Duzer St at Bay St.

No stops missed.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: Bronx-Whitestone
line.text: Southbound Bronx Whitestone Bridge two right lanes closed, expect delays.

line.name: Oyster Bay
line.text:
Oyster Bay Branch Customers:

The 10:19AM train from Oyster Bay due Jamaica at 11:18AM, is being delayed west of East Williston due to a switch problem.

line.name: Wassaic
line.text: Buses replace Wassaic Branch train service April 7 through June 2 between 9 AM and 5 PM on weekdays, and between 8 AM and 3 PM on Sundays to accommodate a rock slope remediation project. The bus schedule is included in the April 7 Harlem Line timetables. See http://bit.ly/9rsE8k for schedule. Customers seeking intermediate travel between Wassaic and Southeast must request the stop to the bus driver.  *Note:  Buses will only stop at intermediate stations when requested*
